sentence: Earlier(2014) : Charles Murray on the 20th Anniversary of "The Bell Curve" From the New York Times news section: Mike Gibbons, a leading contender to succeed Senator Rob Portman, made the comments in a 2013 podcast on doing business in China.
author: Steve Sailer
title: NYT: Shocking Revelation: A GOP Candidate Has Read THE BELL CURVE

sentence: Cleveland businessman and leading Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons joins FOX News Radio's Jessica Rosenthal to discuss past controversial comments, specifically about people of Asian descent, and more on "The Fox News Rundown."
author: Fox News Staff
title: The New York Times hates any conservative: GOP Ohio Senate candidate

sentence: In Ohio, Mike Gibbons, a businessman who is leading the Senate Republican primary in some polls, is fending off allegations that he once favored outsourcing jobs to China.
title: Marco Rubio Leads G.O.P. Push for a More Combative Stance on China
